          <title>
            <string language="en">Nucleus of stable and unstable atoms</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kern der beständigen und instabilen Atome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Noyau des atomes stables et instables</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Núcleo de átomos estáveis e instáveis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nucleo degli atomi stabili ed instabili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυρήνας των σταθερών και ασταθών ατόμων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Núcleo de átomos estables e inestables</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram compares the nucleus of a stable carbon atom (left) and of an unstable carbon atom (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Electrons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">unstable atom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm vergleicht den Kern eines 
beständigen Kohlenstoffatoms (nach links) und des instabilen 
Kohlenstoffatoms (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme compare le noyau d'un atome de 
carbone stable (à gauche) et d'un atome de carbone instable (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama compara o núcleo de um átomo de 
carbono estável (à esquerda) e de um átomo de carbono instável 
(direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema confronta il nucleo di un atomo di 
carbonio stabile (a sinistra) e di un atomo di carbonio instabile (di 
destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα συγκρίνει τον πυρήνα ενός σταθερού
ατόμου άνθρακα (αριστερά) και ενός ασταθούς ατόμου άνθρακα 
(δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama compara el núcleo de un átomo de 
carbón estable (a la izquierda) y de un átomo de carbón inestable 
(derecho).</string>
          </description>
